syllabus_metadata.title: ISTQB Certified Tester - AI Testing (CT-AI)
syllabus_metadata.target_audience: Test professionals working with AI systems and AI-based applications

chapters.title: AI and Testing - Introduction
learning_objectives: CT-AI-1.1.1 (K2) Explain artificial intelligence and its relevance to testing
CT-AI-1.2.1 (K2) Distinguish between AI systems and conventional software systems
CT-AI-1.3.1 (K2) Explain machine learning and its application in testing

chapters.title: Testing AI Systems
learning_objectives: CT-AI-2.1.1 (K4) Analyze AI system testing challenges and approaches
CT-AI-2.2.1 (K3) Apply testing techniques for AI systems
CT-AI-2.3.1 (K2) Explain AI system test data requirements

chapters.title: AI-Driven Testing
learning_objectives: CT-AI-3.1.1 (K3) Apply AI techniques for test automation
CT-AI-3.2.1 (K2) Explain AI-driven test case generation
CT-AI-3.3.1 (K2) Understand AI-based test oracle generation

chapters.title: AI Testing in Practice
learning_objectives: CT-AI-4.1.1 (K4) Evaluate AI testing tools and frameworks
CT-AI-4.2.1 (K3) Implement AI testing in practice
CT-AI-4.3.1 (K2) Understand ethical considerations in AI testing

study_resources.title: Testing AI Systems: A Practitioner's Guide
study_resources.description: Comprehensive guide to AI system testing

practical_exercises.title: AI System Analysis Workshop
practical_exercises.description: Analyze different AI systems and identify testing challenges

practical_exercises.title: Bias Testing Lab
practical_exercises.description: Implement bias testing for a machine learning model

practical_exercises.title: AI-Driven Test Generation
practical_exercises.description: Use AI tools to generate test cases automatically

practical_exercises.title: AI Testing Tool Evaluation
practical_exercises.description: Compare and evaluate different AI testing tools
